title: Strava
body: Strava is a popular mobile app that tracks hikes, runs, rides and swims. It will connect to other wearables.

title: Suunto
body: A watch thats very popular with trail runners. Hard wearing a durability are some of its qualities.

title: Fitbit
body: With an entire family of products that work seamlessly together and with other apps, Fitbit has something for fitness beginners, pro athletes, and everyone in between.
category: Activity Tracker, Water Tracker, Sleep Tracker, Mindfulness Tracker

title: Google Fit app
body: Google Fit is a fitness tracking app available for Android and iOS devices. It's designed to act as a virtual coach to help you achieve a healthier and more active life
category: Activity Tracker, Water Tracker, Sleep Tracker

title: MyFitnessPal
body: Calorie counting app that also supports activity, hydration and sleep tracking
category: Activity Tracker, Water Tracker, Sleep Tracker

title: Oak Meditation
body: Guided meditation and breathing exercises. Learn mindful and loving-kindness meditation today.

title: Oura
body: The most accurate guide on Sleep, Readiness, and Activity
category: Activity Tracker, Water Tracker, Sleep Tracker

title: My Water
body: 8 glasses of water a day is the basis of good nutrition. My Water» will help you reach your goal.

title: Deel
body: Hire the best talent in 150 countries in minutes, without worrying about compliance, payroll or HR admin. It's a world-class experience for your business and entire international team.

title: First Base
body: From startups to large enterprises, businesses of all sizes use Firstbase to setup, manage, maintain and retrieve all the physical equipment their remote workers need to do great work at home.

title: Seed Legals
body: SeedLegals automates the legals you need to grow your business, with unlimited support along the way.

title: Active Things
body: Active Things is your Active Travel Assistant, helping you find and access (secure) bike parking, routes and more.

title: Lift Share
body: Join 700,000 like-minded people saving money and the planet by car sharing

title: Ecologi
body: We plant trees & fund the world’s best climate crisis solutions
